code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

pen = turtle.Turtle()
pen.color('white')
pen.speed(0)

pen.penup()
pen.goto(-100,100)

pen.write(0)
pen.right(90)
pen.forward(10)

guide.img: Let’s start drawing our race track in this lesson
We are making our pen write the number 0, and then turn right, and move forward by 10 pixels from there
